media:group.media:title: Are We All Actually Archaea?
media:group.media:description:
Check out another Complexly production: Journey To The Microcosmos https://youtube.com/microcosmos

The unexpected discovery of an entirely new domain of life was pretty huge and surprising - even if archaea do just look like bacteria. But, in recent years, itâ€™s been their connection to us that's turned out to be particularly full of surprises - ones that may mean we have a connection to a group known as Asgard.
